err.invalidLatOrLon: The provided latitude or longitude is not valid.
err.guildOnly: This action can only be performed inside a server channel.
err.noDestinations: There are no {type:string} destinations in this server.
err.tooManyDestinations: You have exceeded the max limit of {type:string} destinations (`{max:number}`).
err.locationQueryHTTPError: There was a problem retrieving the location you provided.```{errorCode:number}: {errorStatus:string}```

coordLocationAskConfirmation:
The location found for coordinates `{latitude:string},{longitude:string}` is **{location:string}**.
Is this correct?
promptTimedOut: You did not respond to the prompt in time.

err.commandError: I've encountered a problem executing that command. Please try again later.

about.responseTooLong: A preview of my commits is currently too large to send. You can view my commits [here](https://github.com/{repo:string}/commits).

err.destExists: This channel is already designated as an alert destination.
err.noDestBySnowflake: No alert destination exists with the snowflake `{snowflake:string}`.
err.couldNotRemoveDest: The alert destination could not be removed. Please try again later.
err.noDestInChannel: {channel:string} does not have any alert reporting assigned to it.
err.maxDestinationsReached: You have reached the maximum amount of alert destinations in this server.

alerts.destCreated:
Alert reporting created in {channel:string}!
You can remove this reporting destination by using the `/alerts remove` command with the Snowflake `{snowflake:string}`.
alerts.destRemoved: Alert reporting destination has been successfully removed.
alerts.listEmbedTitle: Alert reporting destinations in this server

debug.dumpDescription: A dump of my database taken at {date:Date}.

err.noDestBySnowflake: No forecast destination exists with the snowflake `{snowflake:string}`.
err.couldNotRemoveDest: The forecast destination could not be removed. Please try again later.
err.noDestInChannel: {channel:string} does not have any forecast reporting assigned to it.
err.maxDestinationsReached: You have reached the maximum amount of forecast destinations in this server.

forecasts.placeholderMessage: -# This message is a placeholder and will be used to display the hourly forecast for **{location:string}** {time:string}. Delete this message at any time to stop.
forecasts.destCreated:
Hourly forecast reporting created in {channel:string}!
You can remove this destination by simply deleting the message.
forecasts.listEmbedTitle: Forecast reporting destinations in this server

err.noMessageBySnowflake: No radar message exists by the snowflake `{snowflake:string}`.
err.noMessages: This server does not appear to have any radar messages
err.maxDestinationsReached: You have reached the maximum amount of radar messages in this server.

autoRadar.placeholderMessage: -# This message is a placeholder and will be used to display and update the radar image for **{location:string}**. Delete this message at any time to stop.
autoRadar.destCreated:
{channel:string} should now have a placeholder message sent to it that will be periodically updated with the desired radar image loop.
To remove this designation, simply delete the message at any time.

alerts.payloadTooLargePlaceholder: ## The description of this alert is too large to send. View the full alert [here.]({alertUrl:string})

radar.embedFooter: The closest station that covers this area is {radarStation:string}.
